ygData.subject: Tripred Meeting
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Somehow, I knew Tankor wouln t give an immediate response. Cope up with it! Tankor went back to the control room. Jetstorm flew in at the same moment.

OOC: Somehow, I knew Tankor wouln't give an immediate response. Cope 
up with it!

Tankor went back to the control room. Jetstorm flew in at the same 
moment.

Tankor: Back so soon?

Jetstorm took an irritated look.

Jetstorm: How does it concern you? Those angelions were mere 
mockery...

They both entered the control room where Daemos, Belthassan and 
Anachronox were. Melchana came in moments later.

Daemos: Alright. We will start now, no need to wait for Strika... 
Tripredacus, we are on the brink of a new age. In short time, we will 
start to gather more and more energon, and send it back to Raiko-Fhi 
8. However, there are shadows in our skies. First, the Infecticons. We 
shall deal with them in their own time. Also, more concretely, we have 
to deal with a direct threat to our plan. Prophecy, display world map, 
energon concentration and Spark location.

The computer complied.

Daemos: Geological study reveals that fertile grounds for the energon 
fruits are in this area (points towards greece). However, There are 
many transformers in there, more precisely inside the volcano named 
the Etna. I do not know exactly who is there, but expectations are for 
worst, hopes for the best. Gesper will soon be recalled as to permit 
the assistance of Prophetus in case of danger, so this means the 
Prophets go. I shall go too. Anachronox will be coming as well as 
Jetstorm. Tankor, you will be in charge of the Shadow Destiny until we 
return. Questions?
